title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 409.16 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 409.16 - Severability

State Regulations

To the extent any portion of this part is found by a court
of competent jurisdiction to be preempted by federal law, it is intended that
such portion be reformed to narrow its applicability, to the minimum extent
necessary, and that it shall continue to apply to any student loan servicer to
whom its application is not preempted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
409.16

Adopted

New

York State Register October 16, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 42, eff. 10/16/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
